name: TheWilderRide
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This flash briefing is to help provide our listeners (or potential new listeners) a place to learn about what's happening in our podcast, episodes or guests forthcoming and other news items of interest. Our podcast celebrates the films of Gene Wilder in the movies-by-minutes format. We bring in numerous guests throughout each season, where we have a lot of laughs and maybe even learn a little something along the way.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
